item.description:
Hello Madams!!
By Group Popular Demand we will be viewing Chris Rock's Comedic Documentary about the Hair Weaving Industry and more!

Where are we viewing it: Kaufman Astoria Cinema

Time: 7:20 pm

Meeting Place: Purchase your tickets and come meet me inside the movie! I will be saving seats middle row for all who sign up!


After the the movie we can go for a quick bite or get a night cap and chat about the film!

Please try to show up by 7:20pm as I will be saving a row of seats for us before the lights go out in the theater! Look for the orange scarf at the end of the row!!

See you there Madams!
item.how_to_find_us: Middle row I'll have a orange scarf at the end of the row where I'm siting...
item.name: Good Hair & Good Convo
